sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of xian ji 癇疾 , epilepsy ailment, classified into eight categories. They include feng xian 風癇 , wind epilepsy; jing xian 驚癇 , fright epilepsy; and shi xian 食癇 , food epilepsy; as well as the five types of epilepsy associated with the five depots: heart, liver, spleen, lung, and kidneys. Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry ran she dan 蚺蛇膽：主小兒八癇 , “It controls the eight types of epilepsy in children”.
